short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Unlock creativity with betterGPT! Save, customize, and streamline your AI interactions, now with ChatGPT support.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
BetterGPT is your ultimate companion for AI assistants, designed to streamline your interactions and empower your creativity across various platforms, with dedicated support for ChatGPT. As a versatile Chrome extension, BetterGPT enriches your experience with a range of innovative features aimed at making your life easier.

Features:

1. Save and Reuse: Say goodbye to repetitive typing. With betterGPT, you can effortlessly save your favorite responses and prompts for later use. Whether it's a commonly used greeting or a frequently asked question, betterGPT ensures that your valuable content is just a click away.

2. Customizable Templates: Tailor your responses to perfection. betterGPT allows you to create and customize templates, empowering you to craft personalized messages with ease. From professional emails to engaging conversation starters, unlock your creativity with customizable templates.

3. Snippet Library: Access a curated library of snippets for quick reference. betterGPT categorizes snippets for various contexts, providing instant access to relevant content. Whether you need quick answers to common inquiries or inspiration for your next project, the snippet library has you covered.
